item.title: Akka Router
item.description: Intro # In Akka, Router routes messages to destination Akka Actors called routees that can process messages in parallel to improve throughput. The way routing is done may be configured to fit the use-case. Routing Strategies # Determines how router routes to its routees. RandomRoutingLogic: Pure random and fast. May be unbalanced. RoundRobinRoutingLogic: Take turns. Is more fair and distributed. But depending on the messages, some actors may have more work than others.
